author: Sam-Harper
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds the new E/gamma trigger debug object (now renamed trigger::EgammaObject 

No changes are expected as this is a producer which is only so far run in the e/gamma phase-II HLT

#### PR validation:

Tested in E/gamma Phase-II HLT

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
backport of
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32486

useful for HLT TDR
title: New HLT DEBUG object: EgTrigSumObj : CMSSW_11_1_X
